meanings.definition: The act of lying or making false statements under oath.
meanings.sent1: The perjuries committed in court led to serious consequences.
meanings.sent2: The judge was determined to uncover any perjuries during the trial.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked about the perjuries in a hilarious skit.
meanings.sent4: Her web of perjuries unraveled when confronted with evidence.
meanings.sent5: The perjuries stained his reputation beyond repair.

meanings.sent3: The perjuries in the courtroom drama added a twist to the plot.
